channel.title: Duck and Cover: Cover Version Radio
channel.description: This is ‘Duck and Cover’, a weekly FM radio show playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy cover versions that we can find. Some you might know very well, but some you might find very surprising... However, you won’t be alone on this trip into the musical hinterland, as your host on this journey will be Matt McAteer; who will attempt to explain and justify all of our musical choices. Hopefully, along the way hopefully discovering the exact elements needed to make the perfect ‘Cover Version'
channel.itunes:subtitle: Duck and Cover: Cover Version Radio

channel.itunes:author: Cornucopia Productions
channel.itunes:keywords: cover music, cover versions, covers, comedy, humour, versions, remakes

item.title: Duck and Cover: Show 11
item.description: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy cover versions that we can find. This week we’ll talk about genetic monstrosities, return to an abusive relationship, dig beneath the barrel and finally set off a rather loud emergency alarm. Featuring covers by Jennifer Lopez, Chumbwumba, Guns & Roses, Radiohead, Billy Joel, Aqua, & Don McLean , plus many more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Show 11: Digging Beneath the Barrel
item.itunes:summary: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy cover versions that we can find. This week we’ll talk about genetic monstrosities, return to an abusive relationship, dig beneath the barrel and finally set off a rather loud emergency alarm. Featuring covers by Jennifer Lopez, Chumbwumba, Guns & Roses, Radiohead, Billy Joel, Aqua, & Don McLean , plus many more!

item.title: Duck and Cover: Show 10
item.description: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy cover versions that we can find. This week we’ll start of by knocking a quick one off the wrist, try to understand why computers shouldn’t be given the power to create music and explain why Radio 2 DJ ‘Steve Wright’ is too scary for young children to experience. Featuring covers of Sinead O’Connor, The Pixies, Metallica, Kate Bush, Iggy Pop, Duran Duran & The Prodigy, plus many more
item.itunes:subtitle: Show 10: Turn off Your Computer!
item.itunes:summary: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy cover versions that we can find. This week we’ll start of by knocking a quick one off the wrist, try to understand why computers shouldn’t be given the power to create music and explain why Radio 2 DJ ‘Steve Wright’ is too scary for young children to experience. Featuring covers of Sinead O’Connor, The Pixies, Metallica, Kate Bush, Iggy Pop, Duran Duran & The Prodigy, plus many more

item.title: Duck and Cover: Show 9
item.description: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy cover versions that we can find. This week we’ll knock at your front door and tell you more about deadly incurable diseases, the communist tendencies of Walt Disney and also explain why ‘the line’ is now nothing but a dot to us. Plus as a bonus feature this week; we threaten to kill all Facebook users! Featuring covers of Oasis, Lady Gaga, The Who, Nine Inch Nails, Weird Al & Rage Against the Machine, plus many more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Show 9: Facebook was a Mistake!
item.itunes:summary: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy cover versions that we can find. This week we’ll knock at your front door and tell you more about deadly incurable diseases, the communist tendencies of Walt Disney and also explain why ‘the line’ is now nothing but a dot to us. Plus as a bonus feature this week; we threaten to kill all Facebook users! Featuring covers of Oasis, Lady Gaga, The Who, Nine Inch Nails, Weird Al & Rage Against the Machine, plus many more!

item.title: Duck and Cover: Show 8
item.description: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ we can find. During this show we’ll explain why we don’t like any of the music we choose to play, describe the enjoyment of a good ‘fish salmon roll’ and also we’ll give out some sexual health advice on how to avoid catching a severe of Kajagoogoo this summer. Featuring covers of Robbie Williams, AC/DC, Beyonce , Peter Gabriel Adamski, plus many more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Show 8: Fish Salmon Rolls
item.itunes:summary: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ we can find. During this show we’ll explain why we don’t like any of the music we choose to play, describe the enjoyment of a good ‘fish salmon roll’ and also we’ll give out some sexual health advice on how to avoid catching a severe of Kajagoogoo this summer. Featuring covers of Robbie Williams, AC/DC, Beyonce , Peter Gabriel Adamski, plus many more!

item.title: Duck and Cover: Show 7
item.description: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ based on Beatles songs you’ve ever heard. During this show we’ll explain why climbing Mount Everest in a bobble hat is a bad idea and why Daffy Duck and Paul McCartney might just be the same person. Featuring covers of Obladi Oblada, Eleanor Rigby, Revolution 9, I am The Walrus, Taxman & Yesterday.
item.itunes:subtitle: Show 7: Koo Koo Kachoo
item.itunes:summary: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ based on Beatles songs you’ve ever heard. During this show we’ll explain why climbing Mount Everest in a bobble hat is a bad idea and why Daffy Duck and Paul McCartney might just be the same person. Featuring covers of Obladi Oblada, Eleanor Rigby, Revolution 9, I am The Walrus, Taxman & Yesterday.

item.title: Duck and Cover: Show 6
item.description: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ we can find. During this show we’ll tell why you should always do it "acapella”, why we’d give our left nut for the Muppets and why if the bomb dropped tomorrow, we’ll always have tonight! Featuring covers of Madonna, David Bowie, Beyoncé, The Muppets and Dire Straits, plus many more.
item.itunes:subtitle: Show 6: Muppet Babies
item.itunes:summary: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ we can find. During this show we’ll tell why you should always do it "acapella”, why we’d give our left nut for the Muppets and why if the bomb dropped tomorrow, we’ll always have tonight! Featuring covers of Madonna, David Bowie, Beyoncé, The Muppets and Dire Straits, plus many more.

item.title: Duck and Cover: Show 5
item.description: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ we can find. During this show we’ll introduce you to “Action Buddy”, talk about the best bukkake scene at this year’s adult movie awards and explain why Brain Wilson secretly longed for an Ataria-ST. Featuring covers of ELO, Prince, The White Stripes, S Club 7 & Black Sabbath, plus many more.
item.itunes:subtitle: Show 5: Bukkake Birthday
item.itunes:summary: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ we can find. During this show we’ll introduce you to “Action Buddy”, talk about the best bukkake scene at this year’s adult movie awards and explain why Brain Wilson secretly longed for an Ataria-ST. Featuring covers of ELO, Prince, The White Stripes, S Club 7 & Black Sabbath, plus many more.

item.title: Duck and Cover: Show 4
item.description: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ we can find. During this show we’ll take a close look at white nerdy singer/songwriters, compare Snoop-Dog to Allen Ginsberg and how to create a dirge that could melt your brain at a hundred feet. Featuring covers of The Clash, Snoop Dog, NWA, Rolling Stones, Red Hot Chili Peppers & Kings of Leon, plus many more.
item.itunes:subtitle: Show 4: Dirge Death
item.itunes:summary: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ we can find. During this show we’ll take a close look at white nerdy singer/songwriters, compare Snoop-Dog to Allen Ginsberg and how to create a dirge that could melt your brain at a hundred feet. Featuring covers of The Clash, Snoop Dog, NWA, Rolling Stones, Red Hot Chili Peppers & Kings of Leon, plus many more.

item.title: Duck and Cover: Show 3
item.description: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ we can find. During this show we’ll explain why cover music can make you bulimic, why real musicians only use a ZX spectrum and why the best Kevin Bacon films eventually get performed as touching operas at Glyndebourne. Featuring covers of Queen, Daft Punk, Soundgarden, The Smiths, Human League & Chris Isaak, plus many more.
item.itunes:subtitle: Show 3: Kevin Bacon Loves Us!
item.itunes:summary: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ we can find. During this show we’ll explain why cover music can make you bulimic, why real musicians only use a ZX spectrum and why the best Kevin Bacon films eventually get performed as touching operas at Glyndebourne. Featuring covers of Queen, Daft Punk, Soundgarden, The Smiths, Human League & Chris Isaak, plus many more.

item.title: Duck and Cover: Show 2
item.description: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ we can find. During this show we’ll explain why we love the German language, wonder why Aleister Crowley isn’t advertising ‘Stannah Stair Lifts’ and try our hands at ‘Inuit Throat Singing’. Featuring covers of REM, Abba, Katy Perry, Sex Pistols & Joy Divison, plus many more.
item.itunes:subtitle: Show 2: Stannah Stair Lifts
item.itunes:summary: This is ‘Duck & Cover’, playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy ‘cover versions’ we can find. Featuring covers of REM, Abba, Katy Perry, Sex Pistols & Joy Divison, plus many more.

item.title: Duck and Cover: Show 1
item.description: This is ‘Duck & Cover’; playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy cover versions that we can find. During this show we’ll learn more about kazoos, admit to chewing on some sheep testicles and we’ll try to reason why music played on a banjo always seems so joyous. Featuring covers of Motorhead, Arctic Monkeys, Britney Spears, U2 & Bruce Springsteen, plus many more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Show 1: Sheep Testicles
item.itunes:summary: This is ‘Duck & Cover’; playing all the obscure, strange, weird and downright lousy cover versions that we can find.
